title: Kryptowerk
author: Kryptowerk
created_time: December 14, 2022, 02:32:44 AMLast edit: December 14, 2022, 02:44:54 AM by Kryptowerk
content: - - - 3x Crypto Cosmos Card Deck (factory sealed) - - - Decks are in perfect condition and still in plastic-foil wrapping.More info on the deck: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5068739.0Item will be shipped in a bend- and water-protective parcel.More photos for demonstration of an unpacked deck:  All decks come with their COA card (see pictures).Lot 1: CC Deck #130Lot 2: CC Deck #131Lot 3: CC Deck #133STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0016 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0002 BTCEND TIME: DECEMBER 18th, 2022, 18:00:00 EST (New York Time)TIMER: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?iso=20221218T18&p0=179&font=cursive- Payment due within 24 hours of auction end -SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin, some Altcoins on request (dm BEFORE bidding, otherwise only BTC)SHIPPING: within EU: $7, outside: $10NEW ACCOUNTS: newly created accounts (without positive trust for successful trades and without copper membership) are only allowed to bid if they sent a pm to me first and are willing to deposit a collateral (0.005 BTC) either directly to me or to a trusted escrow on this forum (MJ, Hhampuz, krogoth, Mopar etc.).I also reserve the right to exclude anyone from bidding if they got a bunch of negative trust.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Bump, ends tonight. Makes for the perfect CCC present (crypto cosmos christmas present).Deck contains 36 unique cards and plays like any trump (no, not the ex-president) game. However it's mostly a nice look-at-thing with it's silver coating and engraved box.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: xSlyy on December 19, 2022, 01:44:22 AMLot 3 0.0016Lot 2 0.0016Auction ended a few hours ago, I just wasn't on the forum at that time.Thank you for the bids, though - if you want to get the cards you still can, will shoot you a pm.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I bought a few of these - one to keep sealed and one to open/play with - the cards are great quality - everyone should have at least one deck.
